**Example 1: 创建自定义页面**



Input: 

```
tccli teo CreateCustomErrorPage --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Content  \
    --Entity a.eotest.com \
    --Name file1 \
    --ZoneId zone-285thql0vdhi
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "PageId": 12,
        "RequestId": "awefojm-wfeniou98jw-wjif9"
    }
}
```
